tool_description: AI Picker route optimization engine minimizes the time required for picking an order. Output of the API being a re-ordered distance optimized pick list improving the picker productivity 40-60%
name: AIPickerRoute

api_list.name: AIPickerRoute
api_list.description: Picker route optimization engine minimizes the time required for picking an order. Output being a re-ordered distance optimized pick list.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aipickerroute3.p.rapidapi.com/pickroute"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aipickerroute3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
